question: I was ran over last year in Ramadan and was unable to keep the rest of my fasts, do I have to make up for them now?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is compulsory to make Qadhaa (make-up) for the missed fasts. (Shaami
vol.2 pg.423; HM Saeed)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
